alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 03 at 10:27AM CDT until April 05 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Big Muddy River near Murphysboro affecting Jackson County. .The Big Muddy River will fall below flood stage at Murphysboro Wednesday morning. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Muddy River near Murphysboro. * WHEN...Until Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Minor flooding occurs affecting mainly low lying areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Monday the stage was 22.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning and continue falling to 19.0 feet next Monday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
